Sentencas: Micro solid oxide fuel cells (mu-SOFC) were manufactured with perovskite type proton conductors on silicon substrates and with structured Pt-grid electrodes.
Titulo: Thin film proton conducting membranes for micro-solid oxide fuel cells by chemical solution deposition

Sentencas: In order to miniaturize the mu-SOFCs and to shorten the ion path through the electrolyte, the thin film proton conductors were only similar to 510 nm thick.
Titulo: Thin film proton conducting membranes for micro-solid oxide fuel cells by chemical solution deposition

Sentencas: The thin films consist of 10 mol% yttrium-doped BaZrO3 (BZY10) and they were deposited by means of chemical solution deposition (CSD).
Titulo: Thin film proton conducting membranes for micro-solid oxide fuel cells by chemical solution deposition

Sentencas: CSD was applied, because it represents a highly attractive fabrication method, considering the relatively low investment costs and flexibility with regard to stoichiometry.
Titulo: Thin film proton conducting membranes for micro-solid oxide fuel cells by chemical solution deposition

Sentencas: The backsides of the mu-SOFCs on the substrates were opened by wet chemical and plasma etching to form the freestanding membranes.
Titulo: Thin film proton conducting membranes for micro-solid oxide fuel cells by chemical solution deposition

Sentencas: The completed mu-SOFCs resist up to a temperature of 450 degrees C.
Titulo: Thin film proton conducting membranes for micro-solid oxide fuel cells by chemical solution deposition

Sentencas: Their electrical properties, such as permittivity, and resistivity were investigated.
Titulo: Thin film proton conducting membranes for micro-solid oxide fuel cells by chemical solution deposition

Sentencas: By means of electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) in the temperature range of 100 degrees C to 450 degrees C, the resistivity properties and the activation energies of the model mu-SOFC were studied with humid hydrogen in nitrogen at the anode and different oxygen partial pressures at the cathode.
Titulo: Thin film proton conducting membranes for micro-solid oxide fuel cells by chemical solution deposition

Sentencas: The results provide a clear hint for a dominating protonic defect transport mechanism in the electrolyte.
Titulo: Thin film proton conducting membranes for micro-solid oxide fuel cells by chemical solution deposition

Sentencas: In the 450 degrees C measurement, the model mu-SOFCs reached an open circuit voltage of 600 mV with 100% oxygen at the cathode and humid hydrogen in nitrogen at the anode.
Titulo: Thin film proton conducting membranes for micro-solid oxide fuel cells by chemical solution deposition
Thin film proton conducting membranes for micro-solid oxide fuel cells by chemical solution deposition
